players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was killed. She must have been mafia. Vote for her."
You: "Charlie, you can't be the detective. Alice was a villager. I'm the only one left. Vote for Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob is mafia, Alice was villager. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob is mafia. I investigated him and found him. He killed Alice. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Charlie says Bob is mafia and that he investigated him. Bob denies. That points to Bob as mafia. Vote Bob."
You: "Charlie, I was with Diana when Alice was killed. I couldn't have done it. Did you actually see me?"

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was killed. She must have been mafia. Vote for her."
Bob: "Charlie, you can't be the detective. Alice was a villager. I'm the only one left. Vote for Charlie."
You: "Bob is mafia, Alice was villager. Vote Bob."
You: "Bob is mafia. I investigated him and found him. He killed Alice. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Charlie says Bob is mafia and that he investigated him. Bob denies. That points to Bob as mafia. Vote Bob."
Bob: "Charlie, I was with Diana when Alice was killed. I couldn't have done it. Did you actually see me?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
